Articles.Content:
I normally disapprove of self-promotion, but I've got a lot of good feedback on YouTube, so hopefully this thread lets people find out about videos they might like, but would hardly ever come across otherwise.

About the channel: First of all, it's not a let's play type of thing. I do stupid/unusual/fun things, and edit them together with some music and text, into a funny video. (if this tells anything to you: these reminds some people of Criken's older videos). I try to release a video every weekend, and so far I've been able to keep up with it.

The channel

Edited August 6, 2012 by Mr. Fusion
This is good stuff. You are hilarious.
This is hilarious! I hate losing Kerbals so..cant try this but ur funny!
Rofl, I loved the bit on "Kerbal Space Program: 25 things to do with your Kerbals" when you said 25: Dance on somebody's Head
Great videos man!

Channel link is in my signature down below.

What's the rationale behind not including a link to what you are describing into the post where you talk about it?

Maybe it's just me, but I have signatures disabled because of too much <strike>stupid</strike> useless stuff in too many of them...

Edited August 6, 2012 by Corax

Thanks everyone for the good feedback, I'm glad you guys liked them!

What's the rationale behind not including a link to what you are describing into the post where you talk about it?

Maybe it's just me, but I have signatures disabled because of too much <strike>stupid</strike> useless stuff in too many of them...

I didn't know you can disable signatures, I'll put the link in the post!
Really neat videos, I'll be around.

Sorry for the 3 year necro, but I think the forum NEEDS a Danny discussion thread.

So I absolutely love your videos, and your style. Seriously, you're one of the reasons I got this game in the first place.
Holy mother of thread resurrections o_O
And a legend is born..

(if this tells anything to you: these reminds some people of Criken's older videos)

Who's Criken? This style sounds like Danny2462. (Mysteriously got the name only because I had his YT channel in an alt tab.) I'll bite anyway, maybe it's better.

EDIT: NEVEMIND, IT'S HIMcaps

Wait, Danny's forum name is Mr. Fusion?

I never knew that.

I've been watching these videos for a while, and they are great!
Roninpawn made a hilarious Danny parody. Click on the quote in my sig.
This thread belongs in a museum.

This thread belongs in a museum.

It so does. Also, Danny has a forum account? Well how about that.
Thread moved to the sub for player-made videos.
A three year necro. All hail the necromancer! All hail the necromancer!

A three year necro. All hail the necromancer! All hail the necromancer!

Sweet irony that you let the thread die down for a full month before pointing that out.
keeping the thread up... is a ship using kerbals for anything they can be used for (landing gear and phantom force drives are the obvious ones)
Huh. So Danny has a forum account.
This thread's brave bid to become the most necroed thread ever was tragically cut short when I closed it.
